entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
